mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore at the Upper Buffalo Creek Watershed hearing
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. pointing out an important fact to the Reverend Mr. Arthur Prichard of Mannington at a hearing in Washington on the Upper Buffalo Creek Watershed Project. With Mr Prichard for the hearing was L.E. Moore (left), of Mannington, and Marion County Commissioner John Obondko on the right. The hearing was held by the Subcommittee on Conservation and Credit of the House of Agriculture Committee.
